snippet: Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal will break their 23-23 head-to-head record when they meet for the 47th time in the Qatar Open final Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal will break their 23-23 head-to-head record when they meet for the 47th time in the Qatar Open final Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic to Play Nadal in Final of Qatar Open
headline.main: Djokovic to Play Nadal in Final of Qatar Open
